ruleContent.content: var JsDom = Packages.org.jsoup.Jsoup; var Document = Packages.org.jsoup.nodes.Document; var Element = Packages.org.jsoup.nodes.Element; var document = JsDom.parse(src); var htmlString = document.toString(); var dataMatch = htmlString.match(/data.*?'(.*?)';/); var keyMatch = htmlString.match(/key.*?'(.*?)'.*;/); var ivMatch = htmlString.match(/iv.*?'(.*)'.*;/); java.log(dataMatch); java.log(keyMatch[1]); java.log(ivMatch[1]); var decrypted; var datas; var datas1; if (dataMatch && dataMatch[1] && keyMatch && keyMatch[1] && ivMatch && ivMatch[1]) { var keyCrypto = CryptoJS.enc.Utf8.parse(keyMatch[1]); var ivCrypto = CryptoJS.enc.Utf8.parse(ivMatch[1]); decrypted = CryptoJS.AES.decrypt(dataMatch[1], keyCrypto, {iv: ivCrypto, mode: CryptoJS.mode.CBC}); datas = decrypted.toString(CryptoJS.enc.Utf8); datas1 = JSON.parse(datas); result = datas1; } ##\s{2,}##

ruleBookInfo.author: $.author
ruleBookInfo.init:
<js>
eval(String(source.bookSourceComment));
info = JSON.parse(result).data.content;
result=JSON.parse(decode(info));

source_url = baseUrl.replace('/details/','/source/');
source_info = JSON.parse(java.ajax(source_url)).data.content;
$ = JSON.parse(decode(source_info));

v=String(book.getVariable("custom"));
x=v.match(/^\d+$/)?v:0;
x=parseInt(x)<$.length?x:0;

result.updated_at = $[x].updated_at;
result.last_chapter_name = $[x].last_chapter_name;
result.tocUrl = source.getKey().replace('//s','//catalog')+"/"+$[x].site_path;
result.image = source.getKey().replace('//s','//res') + '/'+result.image;


if($.length>1){
		y = '\nğŸ“Œä½¿ç”¨è¯´æ˜ï¼š æ ¹æ®åºå·è®¾ç½®ä¹¦ç±å˜é‡æ¥åˆ‡æ¢æ¥æº(é»˜è®¤0)\nğŸ¯å½“å‰æºï¼šåºå·ğŸ”º'+x+'ğŸ”»ã€'+$[x].site_name+'ã€‘'+(x==0?' (é»˜è®¤)':'');
for(i in $){
		y += '\nâ¤åºå·ğŸ”º'+i+'ğŸ”»ã€'+$[i].site_name+'ã€‘ \né€‰ç”¨ç‡ï¼š'+$[i].choose+' \næ›´æ–°æ—¶é—´ï¼š '+$[i].updated_at+'\næœ€æ–°ç« èŠ‚ï¼š '+$[i].last_chapter_name;
	}
result.remark += y
}


result = JSON.stringify(result);
</js>
ruleBookInfo.name: $.name

ruleSearch.author: $.author
ruleSearch.bookList:
<js>
eval(String(source.bookSourceComment));
result = JSON.parse(result).data.content;
result=JSON.parse(decode(result));
if(baseUrl.match(/\?keyword=/)){
if(result.book[0]==undefined){
sourl = source.getKey()+"/v1/lists.api?keyword="+java.get('key');
result = JSON.parse(java.ajax(sourl)).data;	
}
}	
result = JSON.stringify(result);
</js>
$.book[*]||$..lists[*]||$.[*]
